Detailed Description

The section has a list of all internal API which are not exposed to the external applications.

Function Documentation

static void CSI_configVC ( CSI_DriverMCB *  ptrCSIDriver,
uint32_t  enableChannel 
)
static

Description
The function is used to configure the virtual channels

Parameters
[in]ptrCSIDriverPointer to the CSI Driver
[in]enableChannelFlag which indicates if the channel is to be enabled or not
Return values
Notapplicable
static int32_t CSI_getHSIClock ( CSI_DataRate  dataRate,
uint32_t *  hsiClock 
)
static

Description
The function is used to get the HSI clock from the specified data rate

Parameters
[in]dataRateCSI Data Rate
[out]hsiClockPopulated HSI Clock to be used.
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0

static

Description
The function is used to perform the reset of the CSI Interface

Parameters
[in]ptrCSIDriverPointer to the CSI Driver
Return values
Notapplicable

static void CSI_setupComplexIO ( CSI_DriverMCB *  ptrCSIDriver)
static

Description
The function is used to setup the complex IO configuration which controls the lane configuration, order and position of the lanes and the polarity order.

Parameters
[in]ptrCSIDriverPointer to the CSI Driver
Return values
Notapplicable
static void CSI_setupControl ( CSI_DriverMCB *  ptrCSIDriver,
uint32_t  ifEnable 
)
static

Description
The function is used to setup the CSI2 Control which is used to control the CSI2 protocol engine module

Parameters
[in]ptrCSIDriverPointer to the CSI Driver
[in]ifEnableStatus flag which indicates if the interface is to enabled or disabled
Return values
Notapplicable

static

Description
The function is used to setup the CSI2 OCP system configuration

Parameters
[in]ptrCSIDriverPointer to the CSI Driver
Return values
Notapplicable

CSI_PhyParams *  ptrParams 
)
static

Description
The function is used to setup the CSI2 PHY Registers

Parameters

Return values

static void CSI_setupTimingTA ( CSI_DriverMCB *  ptrCSIDriver,
uint32_t  forceTxStopModeIO 
)
static

Description
The function is used to setup the timing turn around configuration

Parameters
[in]ptrCSIDriverPointer to the CSI Driver
[in]forceTxStopModeIOFlag which sets the Force Tx Stop mode mode IO bit
Return values
Notapplicable
static int32_t CSI_setupVCFIFO ( CSI_DriverMCB *  ptrCSIDriver)
static

Description
The function is used to setup the virtual channel FIFO configuration

Parameters
[in]ptrCSIDriverPointer to the CSI Driver
Return values
Success- Number of virtual channels configured
Error- <0
